plot: In the days before his son leaves for college, Steve Jones, a lifelong crabber from Wittman, Maryland reflects on his life as a waterman and what he thinks the future holds.
title: The Last Waterman of Wittman
plot_es: In the days before his son leaves for college, Steve Jones, a lifelong crabber from Wittman, Maryland reflects on his life as a waterman and what he thinks the future holds.
plot_en: In the days before his son leaves for college, Steve Jones, a lifelong crabber from Wittman, Maryland reflects on his life as a waterman and what he thinks the future holds.
